texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Identity.Passw: The minimum length a password must be.
The minimum number of unique characters which a password must contain.
If passwords must contain a non-alphanumeric character.
If passwords must contain a lower case ASCII character.
If passwords must contain a upper case ASCII character.
If passwords must contain a digit.
Whether users are required to periodically change their password.
The number of days a user's password is valid for.
texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Identity.Locko: Whether a new user can be locked out.
The duration a user is locked out for when a lockout occurs.
The number of failed access attempts allowed before a user is locked out, assuming lock out is enabled.
texts.Description:SmartSoftware.Identity.SignI: Whether a confirmed email address is required to sign in.

Whether a confirmed telephone number is required to sign in.
Whether the username can be updated by the user.
Whether the email can be updated by the user.
